seo.title: Message sent | Digital Consulting & Web Development for SMEs | Metis Web Agency
seo.description: Thanks for reaching out. We’ll get back to you within 24–48 hours with next steps. If it’s urgent, message us on WhatsApp.

content.title: Thank you for contacting us
content.subtitle: We’ll reply within 24–48 hours with a clear proposal and the next steps.
content.body: If you want to speed things up, send us on WhatsApp your industry, your goal (leads / sales / visibility) and your website link (if any).
